name: Odile Decq
awards:
GOLDEN LION - Venice  Architecture Biennale 10 national and international prizes for the B.P.O. in Rennes (Benedictus, AMO, Steel Construction, Eternit, Design Oscar …) 
,The Benedictus Award  for University buildings in Nantes,Premio « il Principe e l’Architetto » for Museum of Contemporary Art in Roma,Trophy from the Association of Construction Journalists,Chevalier Legion d’Honneur,Honorary member of the National Society of Architects – Tcheque Republic ,Commander Ordre des Arts et Lettres,American Architecture Award  - The Chicago Athenaeum, Illinois, USA pour L. Museum in Neuhaus
representing-galleries: Galerie Polaris (15, rue des Arquebusiers, 75003 Paris, France)
